column2: BRIEF-Walker & Dunlop Reports Q1 2018 Net Income Of $37 Mln May 2 (Reuters) - Walker & Dunlop Inc: * WALKER & DUNLOP REPORTS Q1 2018 NET INCOME OF $37 MILLION * Q1 REVENUE $147.5 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $155.5 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.07 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * WALKER & DUNLOP - DURING Q1 2018, ADDED $1.5 BILLION OF NET LOANS TO SERVICING PORTFOLIO, NEARLY ALL OF WHICH WERE FANNIE MAE & FREDDIE MAC LOANS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
